name: AmbushTD
description:
It's a robot ambush! Build turrets to defend your home from the robot invasion.

Survive 10 waves without letting 5 enemies, or the last boss, all the way through.

Basic turret deals medium damage at a medium range.

Freeze turret deals low damage at a short range, but slows its target.

Sniper turret deals high damage at a long range, but has a slow fire rate.

Made for Weekly Game Jam #191 theme: Ambush

The game can be played in the browser, but runs smoother when downloaded.
